verses.text: Now \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* land \w where|strong="H4033"\w* \w his|strong="H3290"\w* father \w had|strong="H3290"\w* resided, \w the|strong="H3427"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w tending|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s wives \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zilpah|strong="H2153"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w report|strong="H1681"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* loved \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w born|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w*; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w robe|strong="H3801"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* many colors.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3808"\w*’s brothers \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* father loved \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* kind \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3254"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H2492"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w when|strong="H2472"\w* \w he|strong="H3130"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w it|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* brothers, they \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w He|strong="H2088"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w dream|strong="H2492"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w had|strong="H2492"\w*:

\w We|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H1571"\w* binding sheaves \w of|strong="H7704"\w* grain \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* sheaf \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w upright|strong="H5324"\w*, \w while|strong="H2009"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* sheaves \w gathered|strong="H5437"\w* \w around|strong="H5437"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w mine|strong="H1571"\w*.”

“\w Do|strong="H3254"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* intend \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?” \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w asked|strong="H1697"\w*. “\w Will|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w actually|strong="H4427"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?” \w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* statements.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* Joseph \w had|strong="H2492"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w it|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H2472"\w* \w his|strong="H5608"\w* brothers. “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w he|strong="H2009"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w had|strong="H2492"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w this|strong="H2009"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w eleven|strong="H6240"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w were|strong="H2009"\w* \w bowing|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H2472"\w* \w me|strong="H5608"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H2088"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w his|strong="H5608"\w* father \w and|strong="H2088"\w* brothers, \w but|strong="H4100"\w* \w his|strong="H5608"\w* father \w rebuked|strong="H1605"\w* \w him|strong="H2088"\w* \w and|strong="H2088"\w* said, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* \w had|strong="H2492"\w*? \w Will|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* mother \w and|strong="H2088"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* actually come \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H2472"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* ground before \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* brothers \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H7065"\w*, but \w his|strong="H8104"\w* father \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* mind \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H1697"\w* \w had|strong="H1697"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*.

Some time later, Joseph’s brothers \w had|strong="H6629"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w pasture|strong="H7462"\w* \w their|strong="H3212"\w* father’s \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* near \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* brothers \w pasturing|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* flocks \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*? \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* ready; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.” “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* am ready,” \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Israel \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w how|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* faring, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H7725"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*,

\w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w wandering|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w looking|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H7592"\w*?”

“\w I|strong="H5046"\w* am \w looking|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* brothers,” Joseph replied. “\w Can|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w where|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w pasturing|strong="H7462"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* flocks?”

“\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w moved|strong="H5265"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*,” \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w answered|strong="H8085"\w*. “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* say, ‘\w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Dothan|strong="H1886"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w at|strong="H4672"\w* \w Dothan|strong="H1886"\w*.

Now Joseph’s brothers \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w he|strong="H2962"\w* arrived, \w they|strong="H2962"\w* \w plotted|strong="H5230"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.
“\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* comes \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w dreamer|strong="H1167"\w*!” \w they|strong="H1167"\w* said \w to|strong="H2472"\w* one another.

“\w Come|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* pits. \w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* say \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vicious \w animal|strong="H2416"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* devoured \w him|strong="H7200"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w becomes|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*!”

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* tried \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*.

“\w Do|strong="H4057"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. \w Throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* pit \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H4057"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* said \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* father.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w robe|strong="H3801"\w*—\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w robe|strong="H3801"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* many colors \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* wearing—

\w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* pit. \w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* pit \w was|strong="H4325"\w* \w empty|strong="H7386"\w*, \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7993"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H3899"\w*, \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* caravan \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w* \w coming|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*. \w Their|strong="H5375"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w spices|strong="H5219"\w*, \w balm|strong="H6875"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H3910"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* said \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* brothers, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w profit|strong="H1215"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* brother \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* up \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*?

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w when|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Midianite|strong="H4084"\w* \w traders|strong="H5503"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, \w his|strong="H4480"\w* brothers \w pulled|strong="H4900"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* pit \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w*, \w who|strong="H4376"\w* \w took|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* pit \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* clothes,
